DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical Study is TJCS Eye Drops 0.05%(Cyclosporine ophthalmic nano-emulsion) group and Restasis Eye Drops 0.05%(Cyclosporine ophthalmic suspension) group 12 weeks after treatment, each treatment group comparisons for evaluation of efficacy and safety in Moderate to Severe Dry Eye Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of TJCS for Treatment of Moderate to Severe Dry Eye Syndromes
DOC.criteria: Male or female, age 20 or over Patients with moderate to severe dry eye Screening both eyes, the corrected visual acuity is 0.2 or more Screening visits within 4 weeks who treated with systemic cyclosporine or topical cyclosporine ophthalmic solutions. Screening visits within 2 months the patients with systemic or ocular disorders affected the test results (ocular surgery, trauma, or disease) Intraocular pressure(IOP)> 25 mmHg Patient using or to use punctual plug within 1 months. Patients with contact lens.
